      • isAirBlock

        boolean isAirBlock(BlockPos pos)
        Checks to see if an air block exists at the provided location. Note that this only checks to see if the blocks material is set to air, meaning it is possible for non-vanilla blocks to still pass this check.

      • isSideSolid

        boolean isSideSolid(BlockPos pos,
                    EnumFacing side,
                    boolean _default)
        FORGE: isSideSolid, pulled up from World
        Parameters:
        pos - Position
        side - Side
        _default - default return value
        Returns:
        if the block is solid on the side
